scripts.start: DB=db node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
scripts.test: npm run db:reset:test && DB=db-test node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' --test-concurrency=1,1 --test 'tests/**/*.test.ts'
scripts.db:migrate: for f in $(ls migrations/*.sql | sort -V); do sqlite3 db < "$f"; done
scripts.db:migrate:test: for f in $(ls migrations/*.sql | sort -V); do sqlite3 db-test < "$f"; done
